Key Match Events: Balde scored for Guinea-Bissau in the 42nd minute
Salah scored for Egypt in the 70th minute
Sambinha, Nogueira, Djalo, and Franculino received yellow cards for Guinea-Bissau
Kamal and Amin received yellow cards for Egypt
Pre-Game Insights: Guinea-Bissau and Egypt are undefeated in World Cup qualifying heading into Monday's fourth encounter in Group A
Guinea-Bissau has kept consecutive clean sheets against Djibouti and Ethiopia
Egypt claimed maximum points in a 2-1 victory over Burkina Faso
Trezeguet has netted Egypt's last four goals in qualifying
Mohamed Salah has not scored for Egypt since their Africa Cup of Nations opening match against Mozambique in January
